contest-event.event-date:
Sept. 20, 1980 D Fife Charities Band Association Contest
Fife Charities Band Association Contest 1 March, Hymn and Own Choice Test Piece Contest (Separate Points) Fife Charities Band Association Contest fife-charities-band-association-contest
None
Pittencrieff Park, Dunfermline, Fife, Scotland, UK Open Contest Champions: Lochgelly FCBA 'A Band' Champions: Lochgelly FCBA 'B Band' Champions: Kelty & Blairadam March contest - 1st Kilmarnock 94, 2nd Loudon 93. Hymn tune contest - 1st Lochgelly 91, 2nd Kilmarnock 90. Best section 2 band - Tullis Russell. Best section 3 band - Kelty. Best section 4 band - Bathgate. 35th annual contest.
Nov. 7, 2011, 3:49 p.m. Dec. 4, 2014, 9:08 a.m.
1 Lochgelly Band George Bennett
2 Irvine Valley Brass Brian Broadbent
3 Kilmarnock Concert Brass Andrew Keachie
4 Tullis Russell Mills Duncan Campbell
Unknown Result Bathgate Band Jim Anderson
Unknown Result Kelty & Blairadam Band David Paton
